channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-4457|2024-09-16T17:49:02.373Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation 6.0, 6.0.1, 6.0.2, 6.0.3, 6.0.4, 6.0.5, 6.0.6, and 6.0.6.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 163654.

item.title: CVE-2017-1287|2024-09-16T17:17:35.926Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2016-8975|2024-09-16T16:54:11.518Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 118912.
